resources.string: You currently lack sufficient credit to proceed.
Watch Ad to Get Extra Convos
A password reset email has been sent.
Request a password reset email and follow the link provided to reset your password.
Are you certain you wish to delete your account? If yes, please confirm by entering your password.
Are you certain you wish to delete this conversation: "%1$s"?
No more convo generations are available. Please wait for %1$d minutes.
No more convo generations are available. Please wait for %1$d hours and %2$d minutes.
An Email is sent to verify your account. Follow instructions then re-login.
The Email verification link is sent!
%1$s remaining to get your daily convos.
Sorry, Can\'t generate a conversation based on your input. Please try again with a different topic.
Text-to-speech error. Please try again later.
The API Key is invalid. To continue using our services, please update your app.
Unable to load Rewarded Ad. Please try again later.
No account associated with this email address was found.
The email you provided is not registered in our system.
The email you entered may not be in our records.
The password you entered is incorrect.
The email you provided is not valid.
Your password must be a minimum of 6 characters.
Ensure that the password and confirm password fields match.
It appears that your account has already been deleted or disabled.
An account is already registered with the email you provided.
Unable to establish a connection. Please verify your network connection and attempt again.
Currently experiencing high request volume. Please try again in a few minutes.
An error occurred with the API. Please attempt again later.
We encountered an issue while contacting the server. Please try again later.
The item you are attempting to delete does not appear to be found on the server.
Your account is unverified, Make sure to verify your account before generating.
Please select a minimum of %1$d items.
Please select no more than %1$d items
%1$s must be equal to or greater than %2$d
%1$s must be equal to or less than %2$d
